com.marzapower.loggable
Class LoggerContainer

java.lang.Object
  com.marzapower.loggable.LoggerContainer

@Loggable(exclude=true)
public class LoggerContainer
extends java.lang.Object

The Logger container class. This class has an HashMap instance that will contain all the references to Logger instances to be used by the application classes

Method Detail

getInstance

protected static org.apache.log4j.Logger getInstance(java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                                                     Loggable annotation)
Given an annotation, and a class, returns a Logger instance. If a suitable instance already exists in the local container, that instances is returned. Otherwise a new instance is created, added to the container and then returned.

This approach permits to reduce the total number of objects created at runtime to handle all the log request events.

Parameters:
clazz - the Class object that links to the caller class
annotation - the annotation that will be use to handle the logic of creation of the Logger instance
Returns:
a Logger instance suitable for clazz, adapted as required by the annotation

getInstance

protected static org.apache.log4j.Logger getInstance(java.lang.String loggerName,
                                                     Loggable annotation)
Given an annotation, and a log4j logger name, returns a Logger instance. If a suitable instance already exists in the local container, that instances is returned. Otherwise a new instance is created, added to the container and then returned.

This approach permits to reduce the total number of objects created at runtime to handle all the log request events.

Parameters:
loggerName - the name of the log4j logger to be returned
annotation - the annotation that will be use to handle the logic of creation of the Logger instance
Returns:
a Logger instance whose name is loggerName, adapted as required by the annotation

getVoidLogger

public static org.apache.log4j.Logger getVoidLogger()
Returns a void logger, that is to say a logger that will print nothing.

Returns:
a void logger

getRootLogger

public static org.apache.log4j.Logger getRootLogger()
Returns the log4j root logger

Returns:
the log4j root logger
